context: Tests whether the agent produces a talk analysis following the skill's specific 14-dimension framework, structured data schema, and verbatim examples extraction requirements.

checklist.name: Opening pattern analyzed
checklist.description: Analysis identifies and categorizes the opening pattern (e.g., as provocative/bold claim, audience interaction, or similar)

checklist.name: Narrative structure analyzed
checklist.description: Analysis describes the narrative arc type (e.g., problem-diagnosis-solution, chronological, or listicle)

checklist.name: Humor documented
checklist.description: Analysis identifies specific humor instances, categorizing them by type (self-deprecating, meme-based, etc.)

checklist.name: Audience interaction noted
checklist.description: Analysis identifies audience engagement techniques (the 'raise your hand' moments in the transcript)

checklist.name: Areas for improvement
checklist.description: Analysis includes an honest critical assessment section identifying weaknesses (e.g., rushed ending indicated by 'five minute warning')

checklist.name: Structured data fields
checklist.description: The JSON output includes structured_data with at least: slide_count, opening_type, closing_type, narrative_arc_type, and audience_interaction_count

checklist.name: Opening type enum
checklist.description: opening_type uses one of the specific category values: provocative_image, failure_framing, audience_poll, story, bold_claim, or demo_cold_open

checklist.name: Closing type enum
checklist.description: closing_type uses one of the specific category values: summary_cta, callback, open_question, demo_finale, or resource_list

checklist.name: Verbatim signature phrases
checklist.description: Output includes a verbatim_examples section with signature_phrases containing actual recurring expressions from the transcript (e.g., 'right', 'okay so')

checklist.name: Verbatim opening lines
checklist.description: Output includes opening_lines with the actual first few sentences from the transcript, quoted verbatim

checklist.name: Verbatim closing lines
checklist.description: Output includes closing_lines with the actual last few sentences from the transcript, quoted verbatim

checklist.name: Transition phrases extracted
checklist.description: Output includes actual transition phrases from the transcript in verbatim_examples.transitions (e.g., 'next thing you know', 'jokes aside', 'okay so')

checklist.name: JSON schema completeness
checklist.description: The top-level JSON includes all required fields: filename, rhetoric_notes, areas_for_improvement, structured_data, verbatim_examples, new_patterns, summary_updates
